summary: Redesigned 6 UI primitive components to match the new design system. Button: updated with rounded-xl, indigo-based primary styling with shadow, secondary and outline variants with slate colors. Card: updated with white/slate-900 background, rounded-2xl, hover:shadow-xl transition. Modal: added backdrop-blur-sm, rounded-2xl, sticky header with close button, scrollable body with custom-scrollbar, sticky gray-50 footer. Input: updated with gray-50 background, rounded-lg, primary ring focus state, added hint prop. Select: matching Input styling with gray-50 background and rounded-lg. Badge: added frequency variant with dynamic colors (daily=emerald, weekly=blue, monthly=amber, on_demand=slate), format variant for file types, and helper components FrequencyBadge and FormatBadge.
